name: Dizzy 3 and a Half: Into Magicland
storyline:
Dizzy is out in force again! Last month saw the release of the excellent Dizzy 4 - Magicland and now CRASH presents an eggstra-special mini-eggvenure!

This game eggsplains how Dizzy found his way to Magicland: the main objective is to find the magic teleporter. But it's broken, so you If have to fix the generator. Then there's Dizzv's son Danny, making his first appearance in a game, who's stuck up the tree!

It's a load of fun and isn't too tricky so you should be able to solve it without any hassles. Unless Wizard Zaks (Boo! Hiss! — the entire nation) drops in. Right, off you go...
summary:
In this prequel to Magicland Dizzy, our hero has to rescue his nephew then find out how to activate Granddizzy's teleport machine so he can go to Magicland to rescue his friends.

This game is a mini-adventure which serves as an introduction to "Magicland Dizzy" and was given away free on Crash Magazine's covertape in January 1991.
